channel.title: NPC gives XP after kill
channel.description: I have a 474 server and I want all monsters in Slayer Tower to give an amount of Slayer XP for each kill (NOT on Slayer task). I would really appreciate if someone could give me a code.

item.title: NPC gives XP after kill
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

in npchandler.java in the method where npcs get killed(not sure what it’s called)

add something like

if (npcID = … && slayertask(){ (we ur method is called)
addskillxp… (once again, use your method)

look at other codes and you’ll get the idea.

don’t just copy and paste this code. it’s not accurate i just gave an example. but i am pretty sure you got the idea.

Read full topic
